data.title: Chinese University of Hong Kong (Shenzhen)
data.meta_description: Transfer your studies to Bristol through the partnerships we have set up with your institution
data.text:
Transfer your studies to Bristol through the partnerships we have set up with your institution

Download your Transfer Plan

Your transfer plan is an important document that contains information on entry requirements, how to apply, fees, scholarships and transfer opportunities.

Postgraduate Opportunities

If you are studying one of the degree programmes in the dropdown below, then there are opportunities for you to transfer onto one of our postgraduate programmes. Click on your degree programme to find out more about your opportunities.

Bachelor of Translation

Programmes at Bristol

You can study the following degree programme(s) at Bristol:

MA Chinese-English Translation

MA Chinese-English Audiovisual Translation

MA Comparative Literatures and Cultures

Number of years at CUHK

4 years

How to apply

Once you have read your Transfer Plan and are happy you meet the entry requirements, you can apply using our online application form. Once you have submitted your application, we aim to get back to you within four working days.

Why Bristol?

Discover Bristol
